basics.name: Konstantinos E Kakosimos
basics.label: Associate Professor
basics.summary: Associate Professor at Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (AUTh); adjunct at Texas A&M University at Qatar (TAMUQ). Research focuses on transport & reacting phenomena, environmental sustainability and air quality, solar-driven chemical processes, and process safety.

work.name: Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (AUTh)
work.summary: Teaching and research in chemical engineering with emphasis on experimental transport phenomena.
highlights: clean and sustainable chemical engineering, circular economy, renewable hydrogen, solar-driven and photo-electro-chemical processes, irradiation-assisted catalysis, hybrid thermal-photon systems, process intensification, decarbonization of cement and minerals, air quality and pollution reduction, particulate matter and aerosol characterization and apportionment, environmental fluid mechanics, digital twins and process systems modeling, environmental data analytics, techno-economic and life cycle assessment, environmental and safety decision support systems
